Diamond::

She saw him raise his gun at her and fire.  The shot hit her in the 
shoulder as she tried to jump off the table.  She fell to the floor 
and drew her own gun.  Her left arm just hung down at her side, 
totally numb.  She turned the table over and used it as a shield.  
She knelt down behind the table and drew her own quazar pistol. "You 
know, it's a shame you had to do that. I thought you were rather 
cute."  she jumped up, fired on Devilduer and ducked behind the 
table.  She didn't know the lay out of the ship or how to get out.  
She would have to get creative on her escape plan.  She looked around 
the room and saw a ventalator shaft opening near the ceiling.  She 
had to get to it.  She shot at the vent cover and watched it fall to 
the ground.  She then took out her small crossbow with a little pully 
assembly on it. She fired and the arrow stuck in the ceiling.  She 
then pulled the trigger on the crossbow and it hoisted her up towards 
the vent.  "Hate to chat and run my friend, but I'm afraid I over 
stayed my welcome."  She twisted around and dove into the vent shaft.
She transformed into rattle snake mode and slithered around down the 
shaft.  SHe flicked her tongue to try to catch the scent of fresh air 
from outside, but didn't.  She knew she would get lost int he vent 
system if she wasn't too careful.  She slithered along the vent shaft 
untill she came to a cross in the shaft.  She looked in all 
directions, trying to find her way out.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> "I'm gonna check your damages," DevilDuer says, tapping a few keys 
on a 
> console to prepare the computer to reprogramm a bot, "Now hold 
still, this 
> won't hurt."
> 
> He suddenly brings up his stun gun, now completely recharged, and 
fires it at 
> Diamond.
